A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat hatin’ sheriff (and his k-9). The youth of the town has developed some black magic that compels everyone to kill one and only ONE cat. Their target is a stray named Ragsdale, acted by Jason Schwarzie-Pummey.
